name: Panza
description:
Local pvp twin stick arcade game

The game is about shooting each other with your tank's cannon. The one who stays alive wins!

Move your tank with the left stick and rotate the canon with the other one.
Shoot with the right trigger. Use the A- and B-buttons for the menu.

There are some other mechanics in the middle of the playground. Find out how they work.

The game also supports fullscreen and changing the brightness of the screen. Go to the settings page in the main menu to set it up.

Don't expect too much. This is my first Godot game ;)
